item.title: About
item.description: I’m Pavan, a software and technology enthusiast with over 13 years of experience building applications for Governments, SMEs and multinationals, having advised across eGovernance, eCommerce, Finance, Insurance, Telecom and Cloud security domains. I’ve built, shipped and maintained production quality products for various clients, having worked on hard problems with some exceptionally bright people and have that experience to draw upon. Being a fast learner, I can pick-up new tools rather quickly.
